${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:SourceCode.NAME: Source Code
${modID}:SourceCode.FLAVOR: The decompiled instructions for a computer to run some sort of primitive video game from a bygone era.
DESCRIPTIONS: Card rewards from normal combats have one additional card.

${modID}:DefectiveProsthetic.NAME: Defective Prosthetic
${modID}:DefectiveProsthetic.FLAVOR: A faulty prosthetic arm adapted from the technology of a mechanical technocracy. It almost seems alive...
DESCRIPTIONS: Permanently gain 1 additional Orb slot.  Blue cards can now appear anywhere Fuchsia cards do.

${modID}:Phurba.NAME: Phurba
${modID}:Phurba.FLAVOR: A ceremonial stake used to establish stability in certain rituals.

${modID}:WandOfMissiles.NAME: Wand of Missiles
${modID}:WandOfMissiles.FLAVOR: A reliable backup weapon no Sergeant-Mage would be caught dead without.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b
